scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp build && webpack --config packages/webpack.config.js --progress --colors
scripts.capture: MDC_COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) MDC_BRANCH_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --ui tdd --timeout 90000 test/screenshot/capture-suite.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:screenshots
scripts.posttest: npm stop && istanbul report --root coverage text-summary && istanbul check-coverage --lines 95 --statements 95 --branches 95 --functions 95
scripts.test:unit: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=test karma start karma.local.js --single-run
scripts.test:image-diff: MDC_COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) MDC_BRANCH_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --ui tdd --timeout 10000 test/screenshot/diff-suite.js
scripts.test:screenshots: docker run -it --rm --cap-add=SYS_ADMIN -e MDC_GCLOUD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY="${MDC_GCLOUD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY}" mdcreact/screenshots /bin/sh -c 'git checkout .; git checkout master; git pull; npm i; /home/pptruser/material-components-web-react/test/screenshot/start.sh; sleep 35s; npm run test:image-diff'

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage:
%s
NOTE: Please see angular's commit message guidelines (https://github.com/angular/angular.js/blob/master/DEVELOPERS.md#commits) for information on how to format commit messages.

As an example, here is a valid commit message: 'docs(slider): Document slider public api'

If this commit is on a development / WIP branch, you can disable this by running `git commit --no-verify`.
